content: Oct 31 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1300 GMT on Tuesday:
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

content: Spam meat maker Hormel Foods Corp  said on Tuesday it would buy deli meat and salami maker Columbus Manufacturing Inc for about $850 million  pulling off its biggest acquisition that will expand its line of products in grocery stores.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel to buy premium deli meat  salami maker for $850 million

content: Oct 31 Spam meat maker Hormel Foods Corp said on Tuesday it would buy deli meat and salami maker Columbus Manufacturing Inc for about $850 million  pulling off its biggest acquisition that will expand its line of products in grocery stores.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Hormel to buy premium deli meat  salami maker for $850 mln

content: Oct 31 Spam meat maker Hormel Foods Corp said on Tuesday it will acquire deli meat and salami maker Columbus Manufacturing Inc for about $850 million.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods to buy salami maker Columbus Manufacturing

content: * Hormel Foods announces the retirement of Jeffrey M. Ettinger as chairman of the board. Jim Snee  Hormel Foods president and CEO  elected as chairman

title: BRIEF-Hormel Foods chairman Jeffrey Ettinger to retire

content: LONDON Anglo-Dutch conglomerate Unilever  is vying with U.S. canned meat producer Hormel Foods Corp  to buy the foods division of British consumer goods maker Reckitt Benckiser  the Sunday Times newspaper reported  citing sources.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Unilever vies with Hormel to buy Reckitt food unit: Sunday Times

content: LONDON  July 15 Anglo-Dutch conglomerate Unilever is vying with U.S. canned meat producer Hormel Foods Corp to buy the foods division of British consumer goods maker Reckitt Benckiser  the Sunday Times newspaper reported  citing sources.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Unilever vies with Hormel to buy Reckitt food unit -Sunday Times

content: CHICAGO  June 21 Tyson Foods Inc will test a new way to render chickens unconscious before slaughter  the company said on Wednesday  in the latest sign that heightened concerns about animal welfare are affecting U.S. meat processors.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: U.S. meat processor Tyson to test new method to stun chickens

content: WINNIPEG/CHICAGO/BEIJING  June 5 Canada has overtaken the United States as the top North American supplier of pork to China as farmers and meat packers in both nations battle for lucrative shares of the biggest global market.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: INSIGHT-Canada beats US in pork sales to China - feet  elbows and all

content: WINNIPEG/CHICAGO/BEIJING  June 5 Canada has overtaken the United States as the top North American supplier of pork to China as farmers and meat packers in both nations battle for lucrative shares of the biggest global market.

content: (Attention: An earlier version of this story published on Jan. 31 carried an incorrect photo of a brand not involved with the abuse detailed in the story. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.)
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel stops operations at supplier farm after video shows animal abuse

content: Jan 31 Packaged foods maker Hormel Foods Corp  said on Tuesday that it had suspended operations at one its pork suppliers in Oklahoma until it investigates claims that pigs were being abused at the farm.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: CORRECTED-Hormel stops operations at supplier farm after video shows animal abuse

content: Nov 21 Smithfield Foods said it would buy Farmer John and Saag's Specialty Meats brands  and farm operations in three U.S. states from Hormel Foods Corp for $145 million in cash.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Smithfield Foods to buy Farmer John from Hormel

content: CHICAGO  Nov 12 A U.S. hog slaughterhouse  where workers were videoed beating animals  took action on Thursday to meet demands from Hormel Foods Corp  its only customer  that it tighten controls and give extra training to staff.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: U.S. supplier to Hormel tightens controls after animal abuse video

content: CHICAGO  Nov 11 The U.S. Agriculture Department is reviewing the authenticity of a video that allegedly shows animals being beaten and feces-covered pigs at a hog slaughterhouse that supplies SPAM-maker Hormel Foods  and plans to investigate if the video proves to be real  the agency said on Wednesday.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: USDA probes animal abuse video at Hormel pork supplier QPP

content: NEW YORK  Oct 29 Hormel Foods Corp said on Thursday that it was voluntarily recalling a limited number of jars of its Skippy peanut butter in seven U.S. states because they might contain small pieces of metal shavings.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods issues limited U.S. recall of Skippy peanut butter

content: NEW YORK  Oct 29 Hormel Foods Corp said on Thursday that it was voluntarily recalling a limited number of jars of its Skippy peanut butter in seven U.S. states because they might contain small pieces of metal shavings.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Hormel Foods issues limited U.S. recall of Skippy peanut butter

content: May 26 Hormel Foods Corp said it would buy natural and organic meat processor Applegate Farms LLC for about $775 million to cater to an increasing demand for food free of antibiotics  hormones and artificial additives.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Hormel Foods to buy organic meat company Applegate

content: Hormel Foods Corp   the maker of Spam lunch meat  said it would buy meat processor Applegate Farms LLC for about $775 million to expand its natural and organic meat products.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods to buy organic meat company Applegate for $775 million

content: May 26 Hormel Foods Corp  the maker of Spam lunch meat  said it would buy meat processor Applegate Farms LLC for about $775 million to expand its natural and organic meat products.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods to buy organic meat company Applegate for $775 mln

content: Hormel Foods Corp  the maker of Spam lunch meat  said it expected sales at its Jennie-O Turkey Store business to fall about 15 percent in the second half of the year  due to a supply shortfall caused by an avian flu outbreak in the United States.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods says avian flu likely to hurt turkey sales till 2016

content: CHICAGO  May 20 Hormel Foods' chief executive cast doubt on federal forecasts for as much as 4 percent increase in turkey meat production on Wednesday  due to a devastating outbreak of avian flu that has "significantly challenged" its Jennie-O Turkey Store business.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods to USDA: Your turkey forecast is for the birds

content: * Says Jennie-O sales may fall 15 pct in 2nd half of 2015   (Adds details from conference call  updates shares)
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Hormel Foods says avian flu likely to hurt turkey sales till 2016

content: May 20 Hormel Foods Corp  the maker of Spam lunch meat  reported a 28.2 percent rise in quarterly profit  helped by lower costs in its refrigerated foods business.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods 2nd-qtr profit rises 28 pct

content: CHICAGO The U.S. government approved the use of an additional $330 million in emergency funds to help contain the worst avian influenza outbreak in U.S. history  as infected bird cases soared and hundreds of Minnesota poultry workers learned they would lose their jobs.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Exclusive: U.S. boosts bird flu emergency funds as Hormel cuts jobs

content: CHICAGO The U.S. government approved the use of an additional $330 million in emergency funds to help contain the worst avian influenza outbreak in U.S. history  as infected bird cases soared and hundreds of Minnesota poultry workers learned they would lose their jobs.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Exclusive: U.S. boosts bird flu emergency funds as Hormel cuts jobs

content: CHICAGO  May 5 Hormel Foods Corp unit Jennie-O Turkey Store will temporarily lay off 233 workers at a Minnesota plant because an outbreak of bird flu has reduced the number of turkeys available for processing  the company said on Tuesday.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel unit Jennie-O lays off employees due to bird flu in poultry

content: CHICAGO The spread of a deadly strain of bird flu into an Iowa egg farm accelerated market concerns over how big a bite the current outbreak could take from the United States' egg and poultry businesses  sending shares of several leading meat companies' down on Tuesday.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods  other meat company shares fall as bird flu concerns mount

content: CHICAGO  April 21 The spread of a deadly strain of bird flu into an Iowa egg farm accelerated market concerns over how big a bite the current outbreak could take from the United States' egg and poultry businesses  sending shares of several leading meat companies' down on Tuesday.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Hormel Foods  other meat company shares fall as bird flu concerns mount

content: CHICAGO  April 8 A U.S. outbreak of a deadly strain of bird flu accelerated on Wednesday with the infection of a sixth turkey flock in Minnesota  the nation's top turkey-producing state  in less than a week.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: U.S. bird flu outbreak accelerates as wild ducks migrate north

content: Hormel Foods Corp  is in late-stage talks to acquire Applegate Farms LLC  a privately held producer of organic hot dogs  bacon and sausages  to enhance its branded protein offerings  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods nears deal for Applegate Farms: sources

content: Feb 12 Hormel Foods Corp is in late-stage talks to acquire Applegate Farms LLC  a privately held producer of organic hot dogs  bacon and sausages  to enhance its branded protein offerings  according to people familiar with the matter.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: Hormel Foods nears deal for Applegate Farms-sources

content: Jan 30 Processing lines at some U.S. hog slaughterhouses are moving too fast for inspectors to adequately address contamination and food safety concerns  according to an advocacy group that says it has obtained affidavits from four government meat inspectors.
name: Hormel Foods Corporation
title: U.S. pork plant program draws criticism  Hormel petition
